items.meaning: A round fruit with red or green skin
items.hint: Snow White's favorite fruit

items.meaning: A basic food made from flour, water, and yeast
items.hint: You use it to make sandwiches

items.meaning: A piece of furniture for sitting on
items.hint: You sit on it at a desk

items.meaning: A movable barrier used to close off an entrance
items.hint: You open and close it when entering a room

items.meaning: An oval food item laid by birds and some reptiles
items.hint: Chickens lay these

items.meaning: A small domesticated feline pet
items.hint: Says 'meow' and likes to chase mice

items.meaning: A domesticated canine pet
items.hint: Man's best friend

items.meaning: A large gray mammal with a long trunk
items.hint: The largest land animal with a very long nose

items.meaning: An aquatic animal that swims in water
items.hint: Lives in water and has fins

items.meaning: A tall African animal with a very long neck
items.hint: The tallest animal in the world

items.meaning: A sandy or pebbly shore by the ocean
items.hint: A place with sand where people go swimming

items.meaning: A visible mass of water droplets in the sky
items.hint: White fluffy things in the sky

items.meaning: The colorful bloom of a plant
items.hint: Bees collect nectar from these colorful plants

items.meaning: A very high natural elevation of the earth
items.hint: The highest natural point on land

items.meaning: A tall plant with a trunk and branches
items.hint: Birds build nests in these tall plants

items.meaning: A sturdy shoe that covers the ankle
items.hint: Tall shoes you wear in snow or rain

items.meaning: A piece of clothing worn over other clothes for warmth
items.hint: You wear this to stay warm in winter

items.meaning: A covering worn on the head
items.hint: Keeps your head warm or shaded from the sun

items.meaning: A piece of clothing worn on the upper body
items.hint: You wear this on top with pants or skirts

items.meaning: A covering for the foot
items.hint: You wear these on your feet when you go out

items.meaning: A two-wheeled vehicle powered by pedaling
items.hint: You ride it by pushing two pedals with your feet

items.meaning: A large motor vehicle carrying passengers
items.hint: A big yellow vehicle that takes children to school

items.meaning: A four-wheeled motor vehicle
items.hint: Most families have this in their garage

items.meaning: A connected line of railroad cars
items.hint: Runs on tracks and makes a 'choo-choo' sound

items.meaning: An aircraft that flies through the air
items.hint: Flies in the sky with wings

items.meaning: Water falling from clouds in drops
items.hint: You need an umbrella when this happens

items.meaning: Frozen water falling as white flakes
items.hint: White and cold, makes good snowmen

items.meaning: Severe weather with strong winds and precipitation
items.hint: Thunder and lightning come with this

items.meaning: The star at the center of our solar system
items.hint: Bright yellow circle in the sky during day

items.meaning: Moving air in the atmosphere
items.hint: You can feel it blow but can't see it

items.meaning: An upper limb of the human body
items.hint: You use these to hug people

items.meaning: An organ used for seeing
items.hint: You use these to read and watch

items.meaning: The end part of the arm with fingers
items.hint: You use these to write and hold things

items.meaning: A limb used for standing and walking
items.hint: You need these to run and jump

items.meaning: The organ used for smelling
items.hint: In the middle of your face, helps you smell

items.meaning: A piece of furniture for sleeping
items.hint: You sleep on this at night

items.meaning: A building where people live
items.hint: A place where families live together

items.meaning: A room for cooking and preparing food
items.hint: The room where you cook food

items.meaning: An enclosed space in a building
items.hint: A space with four walls inside a building

items.meaning: An opening in a wall to let in light and air
items.hint: You can see outside through this

items.meaning: A set of printed pages bound together
items.hint: You read stories in this

items.meaning: A piece of furniture for writing or working at
items.hint: You sit at this in class

items.meaning: A writing tool made of wood and graphite
items.hint: You can erase what you write with this

items.meaning: A person who helps others learn
items.hint: The person who leads the class

items.meaning: A person who is learning at a school
items.hint: Someone who goes to school to learn

items.meaning: The color of the sky on a clear day
items.hint: The color of the ocean and clear sky

items.meaning: The color of grass and leaves
items.hint: The color of most plants and trees

items.meaning: The color of blood or a ripe tomato
items.hint: The color of stop signs and fire trucks

items.meaning: The color of the sun or bananas
items.hint: The color of lemons and sunflowers

items.meaning: A color that is a mix of red and blue
items.hint: The color of grapes and eggplants

items.meaning: An electronic device for processing information
items.hint: You use this to browse the internet

items.meaning: A device for making calls and communication
items.hint: You use this to call friends and family

items.meaning: A device for watching broadcast programs
items.hint: You watch shows and movies on this

items.meaning: A device for taking photographs
items.hint: You use this to take pictures

items.meaning: A machine that can perform automated tasks
items.hint: A machine that can move and work like a person

items.meaning: A person who treats sick people
items.hint: You visit them when you're sick

items.meaning: A professional cook
items.hint: They cook food in restaurants

items.meaning: A person who flies aircraft
items.hint: They fly planes in the sky

items.meaning: A person who creates art
items.hint: They paint pictures and make sculptures

items.meaning: A person who works on a farm
items.hint: They grow food and raise animals

items.meaning: A ball game played with the feet
items.hint: You kick a round ball to score goals

items.meaning: A ball game played with hands and a hoop
items.hint: You throw a ball through a high ring

items.meaning: A racket sport played over a net
items.hint: You hit a small yellow ball back and forth

items.meaning: Moving through water using body movements
items.hint: Moving in water using your arms and legs

items.meaning: Moving rapidly on foot
items.hint: Moving fast with your legs

items.meaning: Feeling or showing pleasure and contentment
items.hint: How you feel when something good happens

items.meaning: Feeling or showing sorrow
items.hint: How you feel when you might cry

items.meaning: Feeling or showing strong annoyance
items.hint: How you feel when something upsets you a lot

items.meaning: Very enthusiastic and eager
items.hint: How you feel on your birthday or Christmas

items.meaning: Needing sleep or rest
items.hint: How you feel when you need to sleep

items.meaning: The early part of the day
items.hint: When the sun rises and you wake up

items.meaning: The time between noon and evening
items.hint: The time after lunch but before dinner

items.meaning: The end of the day
items.hint: When it starts getting dark outside

items.meaning: The dark period between sunset and sunrise
items.hint: When it's dark and people usually sleep

items.meaning: A period of seven days
items.hint: Monday through Sunday
